MERGE INTO BOOKMARK_TB B USING (SELECT #{id} AS MEMBER_ID_FK, #{boardNo} AS BOARD_NUM_FK from dual) D ON (B.MEMBER_ID_FK = D.MEMBER_ID_FK AND B.BOARD_NUM_FK = D.BOARD_NUM_FK)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET B.BOOKMARK_STATUS = 1, B.BOOKMARK_CREATE_DT = SYSDATE
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (BOOKMARK_NUM_PK, MEMBER_ID_FK, BOARD_NUM_FK, BOOKMARK_STATUS, BOOKMARK_CREATE_DT) VALUES (BOOKMARK_TB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{boardNo}, 1, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOOKMARK_TB WHERE MEMBER_ID_FK = #{id} AND BOOKMARK_NUM_PK = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK_TB WHERE MEMBER_ID_FK = #{id} AND BOARD_NUM_FK = #{boardNo}

SELECT B.BOARD_NUM_PK, B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.MEMBER_ID_FK, B.BOARD_DT FROM BOARD_TB B INNER JOIN BOOKMARK_TB BM ON B.BOARD_NUM_PK = BM.BOARD_NUM_FK WHERE BM.MEMBER_ID_FK = #{id} AND BM.BOOKMARK_STATUS = 1 ORDER BY BM.BOOKMARK_CREATE_DT DESC
